featured.text: And how good a magic sword would feel in our hand as we go off to kill a dragon or win the hand of a beautiful princess.

definition.zh_def: 公主；王室成員的女性，通常是國王或女王的女兒。
definition.en_def: A female member of a royal family, typically the daughter of a king or queen.
definition.example: The princess wore a beautiful gown to the royal ball.
